sqlServerV2.name: sqlServerV2

revisions.description: The initial revision of this MIB module.

sqlServerV2.contactinfo: Garth Williams 11135-23A Ave Edmonton, AB T6J4W5 Canada Tel: +1 780 434 4113 E-mail: garth.williams@wtcs.org
sqlServerV2.description: The MIB module for informant SQL Server V2 entries. This module supports SQL Server 2005 and SQL Server 2008.

as2NameTable.name: as2NameTable
as2NameTable.description: This table contains the list of Analysis Services instance names installed. The as2NameIndex is used to refer to all other Analysis Services SNMP entries.

as2NameEntry.name: as2NameEntry
as2NameEntry.description: Performance information for one Analysis Services name instance.

as2NameIndex.name: as2NameIndex
as2NameIndex.description: The index number associated with the instance name

as2NameInstance.name: as2NameInstance
as2NameInstance.description: The name of the Analysis Services installed instance.

as2CacheTable.name: as2CacheTable
as2CacheTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services aggregation cache.

as2CacheEntry.name: as2CacheEntry
as2CacheEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2CacheCurrentKB.name: as2CacheCurrentKB
as2CacheCurrentKB.description: Current memory used by the aggregation cache, in KB.

as2CacheDirectHitRatio.name: as2CacheDirectHitRatio
as2CacheDirectHitRatio.description: Ratio of cache direct hits to cache lookups, for the period between obtaining counter values.

as2CacheDirectHitsPerSec.name: as2CacheDirectHitsPerSec
as2CacheDirectHitsPerSec.description: Rate of cache direct hits. Queries were answered from an existing cache entry.

as2CacheEvictionsPerSec.name: as2CacheEvictionsPerSec
as2CacheEvictionsPerSec.description: Rate of evictions from the cache. This is per partition per cube per database. Typically due to background cleaner.

as2CacheInsertsPerSec.name: as2CacheInsertsPerSec
as2CacheInsertsPerSec.description: Rate of insertions into the cache. This is per partition per cube per database.

as2CacheKBAddedPerSec.name: as2CacheKBAddedPerSec
as2CacheKBAddedPerSec.description: Rate of memory added to the cache, KB/sec.

as2CacheTotalDirectHits.name: as2CacheTotalDirectHits
as2CacheTotalDirectHits.description: Total count of direct cache hits. Queries were answered from existing cache entries.

as2CacheTotalEvictions.name: as2CacheTotalEvictions
as2CacheTotalEvictions.description: Evictions from the cache. This is per partition per cube per database. Typically due to background cleaner.

as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachHit.name: as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachHit
as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachHit.description: Total number of cache hits that returned an indexed iterator over the filtered results

as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachMis.name: as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachMis
as2CacheTotalFiltIteratorCachMis.description: Total number of cache hits that were unable to build an indexed iterator over the filtered results and had to build a new cache with the filtered results

as2CacheTotalInserts.name: as2CacheTotalInserts
as2CacheTotalInserts.description: Insertions into the cache. This is per partition per cube per database.

as2CacheTotalLookups.name: as2CacheTotalLookups
as2CacheTotalLookups.description: Total number of lookups into the cache.

as2ConnectionTable.name: as2ConnectionTable
as2ConnectionTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services connections.

as2ConnectionEntry.name: as2ConnectionEntry
as2ConnectionEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2ConnectionCurrentConnections.name: as2ConnectionCurrentConnections
as2ConnectionCurrentConnections.description: Current number of client connections established.

as2ConnectionCurrentUserSessions.name: as2ConnectionCurrentUserSessions
as2ConnectionCurrentUserSessions.description: Current number of user sessions established.

as2ConnectionRequestsPerSec.name: as2ConnectionRequestsPerSec
as2ConnectionRequestsPerSec.description: Rate of connection requests. These are arrivals.

as2ConnectionTotalRequests.name: as2ConnectionTotalRequests
as2ConnectionTotalRequests.description: Total connection requests. These are arrivals.

as2DataMiningModelProcessTable.name: as2DataMiningModelProcessTable
as2DataMiningModelProcessTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services Data Mining model processing.

as2DataMiningModelProcessEntry.name: as2DataMiningModelProcessEntry
as2DataMiningModelProcessEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2dmmpCurrentModelsProcessing.name: as2dmmpCurrentModelsProcessing
as2dmmpCurrentModelsProcessing.description: Current number of models being processed

as2DataMiningPredictionTable.name: as2DataMiningPredictionTable
as2DataMiningPredictionTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services Data Mining prediction.

as2DataMiningPredictionEntry.name: as2DataMiningPredictionEntry
as2DataMiningPredictionEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2dmpConcurrentDMQueries.name: as2dmpConcurrentDMQueries
as2dmpConcurrentDMQueries.description: Current number of Data Mining queries being actively worked on.

as2dmpPredictionsPerSec.name: as2dmpPredictionsPerSec
as2dmpPredictionsPerSec.description: Rate of Data Mining prediction queries

as2dmpTotalPredictions.name: as2dmpTotalPredictions
as2dmpTotalPredictions.description: Total Data Mining Prediction Queries received by the server

as2dmpTotalQueries.name: as2dmpTotalQueries
as2dmpTotalQueries.description: Total Data Mining Queries received by the server

as2dmpTotalRows.name: as2dmpTotalRows
as2dmpTotalRows.description: Total Rows returned by Data Mining queries

as2LocksTable.name: as2LocksTable
as2LocksTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services internal server locks.

as2LocksEntry.name: as2LocksEntry
as2LocksEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2LocksCurrentLatchWaits.name: as2LocksCurrentLatchWaits
as2LocksCurrentLatchWaits.description: Current number of threads waiting for a latch. These are latch requests that could not be given immediate grants and are in a wait state.

as2LocksCurrentLockWaits.name: as2LocksCurrentLockWaits
as2LocksCurrentLockWaits.description: Current number of clients waiting for a lock.

as2LocksLatchWaitsPerSec.name: as2LocksLatchWaitsPerSec
as2LocksLatchWaitsPerSec.description: Rate of latch requests that could not be granted immediately and had to wait before being granted.

as2LocksLockGrantsPerSec.name: as2LocksLockGrantsPerSec
as2LocksLockGrantsPerSec.description: Number of lock grants per second.

as2LocksLockRequestsPerSec.name: as2LocksLockRequestsPerSec
as2LocksLockRequestsPerSec.description: Number of lock requests per second.

as2LocksLockWaitsPerSec.name: as2LocksLockWaitsPerSec
as2LocksLockWaitsPerSec.description: Number of lock waits per second. These are lock requests that could not be given immediate lock grants and were put in a wait state.

as2LocksUnlockRequestsPerSec.name: as2LocksUnlockRequestsPerSec
as2LocksUnlockRequestsPerSec.description: Number of unlock requests per second.

as2MDXTable.name: as2MDXTable
as2MDXTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services MDX Calculations.

as2MDXEntry.name: as2MDXEntry
as2MDXEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2MDXCurrentNumOfCachedEvalNode.name: as2MDXCurrentNumOfCachedEvalNode
as2MDXCurrentNumOfCachedEvalNode.description: Current (approximate) number of cached evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXCurrentNumOfEvalNode.name: as2MDXCurrentNumOfEvalNode
as2MDXCurrentNumOfEvalNode.description: Current (approximate) number of evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans including active and cached

as2MDXNumOfStorageEngineEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumOfStorageEngineEvalNode
as2MDXNumOfStorageEngineEvalNode.description: Total number of Storage Engine evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXNumOfBulkModeEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumOfBulkModeEvalNode
as2MDXNumOfBulkModeEvalNode.description: Total number of bulk-mode evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXNumOfCachedotherEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumOfCachedotherEvalNode
as2MDXNumOfCachedotherEvalNode.description: Total number of cached evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans that are neither Storage Engine nor Bulk-mode

as2MDXNumCacheStorEngineEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumCacheStorEngineEvalNode
as2MDXNumCacheStorEngineEvalNode.description: Total number of cached Storage Engine evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXNumOfCacheBulkModeEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumOfCacheBulkModeEvalNode
as2MDXNumOfCacheBulkModeEvalNode.description: Total number of cached bulk-mode evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXNumberOfCalculationCovers.name: as2MDXNumberOfCalculationCovers
as2MDXNumberOfCalculationCovers.description: Total number of evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans including active and cached

as2MDXNumOfCellByCellEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumOfCellByCellEvalNode
as2MDXNumOfCellByCellEvalNode.description: Total number of cell-by-cell evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans

as2MDXNumCellCellHitCacheEvalNod.name: as2MDXNumCellCellHitCacheEvalNod
as2MDXNumCellCellHitCacheEvalNod.description: Total number of cell-by-cell hits in the cache of evaluation nodes

as2MDXNumCellCellMissCachEvalNod.name: as2MDXNumCellCellMissCachEvalNod
as2MDXNumCellCellMissCachEvalNod.description: Total number of cell-by-cell misses in the cache of evaluation nodes

as2MDXNumEvalNodThatCovASglCell.name: as2MDXNumEvalNodThatCovASglCell
as2MDXNumEvalNodThatCovASglCell.description: Total number of evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans that covered only one cell

as2MDXNumEvalNodeCalcSameGranula.name: as2MDXNumEvalNodeCalcSameGranula
as2MDXNumEvalNodeCalcSameGranula.description: Total number of evaluation nodes built by MDX execution plans for which the calculations were at the same granularity as the evaluation node

as2MDXNumEvictionsEvalNode.name: as2MDXNumEvictionsEvalNode
as2MDXNumEvictionsEvalNode.description: Total number of cache evictions of evaluation nodes due to collisions

as2MDXNumHashdexHitsCacheEvalNod.name: as2MDXNumHashdexHitsCacheEvalNod
as2MDXNumHashdexHitsCacheEvalNod.description: Total number of hits in the cache of evaluation nodes that were satisfied by the hash index

as2MDXNumSubcubeHitsCacheEvalNod.name: as2MDXNumSubcubeHitsCacheEvalNod
as2MDXNumSubcubeHitsCacheEvalNod.description: Total number of subcube hits in the cache of evaluation nodes

as2MDXNumSubcubeMissCacheEvalNod.name: as2MDXNumSubcubeMissCacheEvalNod
as2MDXNumSubcubeMissCacheEvalNod.description: Total number of subcube misses in the cache of evaluation nodes

as2MDXTotalAutoexist.name: as2MDXTotalAutoexist
as2MDXTotalAutoexist.description: Total number of times autoexist performed

as2MDXTotalEXISTING.name: as2MDXTotalEXISTING
as2MDXTotalEXISTING.description: Total number of times EXISTING set operator performed

as2MDXTotalNONEMPTY.name: as2MDXTotalNONEMPTY
as2MDXTotalNONEMPTY.description: Total number of times NON EMPTY algorithms is used

as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYCalculatMemb.name: as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYCalculatMemb
as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYCalculatMemb.description: Total number of times NON EMPTY algorithm was looping over calculated members

as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYUnoptimized.name: as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYUnoptimized
as2MDXTotalNONEMPTYUnoptimized.description: Total number of times unoptimized NON EMPTY algorithm is used

as2MDXTotalSonarSubcubes.name: as2MDXTotalSonarSubcubes
as2MDXTotalSonarSubcubes.description: Total number of subcubes that query optimizer generated

as2MDXTotalCellsCalculated.name: as2MDXTotalCellsCalculated
as2MDXTotalCellsCalculated.description: Total number of cell properties calculated

as2MDXTotalFlatCacheInserts.name: as2MDXTotalFlatCacheInserts
as2MDXTotalFlatCacheInserts.description: Total number of cell values inserted into flat calculation cache

as2MDXTotalRecomputes.name: as2MDXTotalRecomputes
as2MDXTotalRecomputes.description: Total number of cells recomputed due to error

as2MemoryTable.name: as2MemoryTable
as2MemoryTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services internal server memory.

as2MemoryEntry.name: as2MemoryEntry
as2MemoryEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2memAggCacheKB.name: as2memAggCacheKB
as2memAggCacheKB.description: Current memory allocated to filestore (file cache), in KB.

as2memCleanerCurrentPrice.name: as2memCleanerCurrentPrice
as2memCleanerCurrentPrice.description: Current price of memory, $/byte/time, normalized to 1000.

as2memCleanerMemoryKB.name: as2memCleanerMemoryKB
as2memCleanerMemoryKB.description: Amount of memory, in KB, known to the background cleaner. (Cleaner memory shrinkable + Cleaner memory nonshrinkable.)

as2memCleanerMemNonshrinkableKB.name: as2memCleanerMemNonshrinkableKB
as2memCleanerMemNonshrinkableKB.description: Amount of memory, in KB, not subject to purging by the background cleaner.

as2memCleanerMemoryShrinkableKB.name: as2memCleanerMemoryShrinkableKB
as2memCleanerMemoryShrinkableKB.description: Amount of memory, in KB, subject to purging by the background cleaner.

as2memFilestoreClockPgExamineSec.name: as2memFilestoreClockPgExamineSec
as2memFilestoreClockPgExamineSec.description: Rate of background cleaner examining pages for eviction consideration.

as2memFilestoreClockPgHaveRefSec.name: as2memFilestoreClockPgHaveRefSec
as2memFilestoreClockPgHaveRefSec.description: Rate of background cleaner examining pages that have a current reference count (are currently in use).

as2memFilestoreClockPgValidSec.name: as2memFilestoreClockPgValidSec
as2memFilestoreClockPgValidSec.description: Rate of background cleaner examining pages that are valid candidates for eviction.

as2memFilestoreKB.name: as2memFilestoreKB
as2memFilestoreKB.description: Current memory allocated to filestore (file cache), in KB.

as2memFilestoreKBWritePerSec.name: as2memFilestoreKBWritePerSec
as2memFilestoreKBWritePerSec.description: Filestore KB written/sec. The writes are asynchronous.

as2memFilestoreWritesPerSec.name: as2memFilestoreWritesPerSec
as2memFilestoreWritesPerSec.description: Filestore pages written/sec. The writes are asynchronous.

as2memInMemAggregationMapFileKB.name: as2memInMemAggregationMapFileKB
as2memInMemAggregationMapFileKB.description: Current in-memory aggregation map file KB.

as2memInMemAggregateMapFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemAggregateMapFileKBSec
as2memInMemAggregateMapFileKBSec.description: In-memory aggregation map file KB rate.

as2memInMemDimenIndexHashFileKB.name: as2memInMemDimenIndexHashFileKB
as2memInMemDimenIndexHashFileKB.description: Current in-memory dimension index (hash) file KB.

as2memInMemDimenIndHashFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemDimenIndHashFileKBSec
as2memInMemDimenIndHashFileKBSec.description: In-memory dimension index (hash) file KB rate.

as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKB.name: as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKB
as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKB.description: Current in-memory dimension proty file KB.

as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKBSec
as2memInMemDimenProtyFileKBSec.description: In-memory dimension proty file KB rate.

as2memInMemDimenStringFileKB.name: as2memInMemDimenStringFileKB
as2memInMemDimenStringFileKB.description: Current in-memory dimension string file KB.

as2memInMemDimenStringFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemDimenStringFileKBSec
as2memInMemDimenStringFileKBSec.description: In-memory dimension string file KB rate.

as2memInMemFactAggregationFileKB.name: as2memInMemFactAggregationFileKB
as2memInMemFactAggregationFileKB.description: Current in-memory fact aggregation file KB.

as2memInMemFactAggregatFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemFactAggregatFileKBSec
as2memInMemFactAggregatFileKBSec.description: In-memory fact aggregation file KB rate.

as2memInMemoryFactDataFileKB.name: as2memInMemoryFactDataFileKB
as2memInMemoryFactDataFileKB.description: Current in-memory fact data file KB.

as2memInMemFactDataFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemFactDataFileKBSec
as2memInMemFactDataFileKBSec.description: In-memory fact data file KB rate.

as2memInMemoryFactStringFileKB.name: as2memInMemoryFactStringFileKB
as2memInMemoryFactStringFileKB.description: Current in-memory fact string file KB.

as2memInMemFactStringFileKBSec.name: as2memInMemFactStringFileKBSec
as2memInMemFactStringFileKBSec.description: In-memory fact string file KB rate.

as2memMemoryLimitHighKB.name: as2memMemoryLimitHighKB
as2memMemoryLimitHighKB.description: High memory limit, from configuration file.

as2memMemoryLimitLowKB.name: as2memMemoryLimitLowKB
as2memMemoryLimitLowKB.description: Low memory limit, from configuration file.

as2memMemoryUsageKB.name: as2memMemoryUsageKB
as2memMemoryUsageKB.description: Memory usage of the server process. Same as perfmon counter for Process\PrivateBytes.

as2memPagePool1AllocKB.name: as2memPagePool1AllocKB
as2memPagePool1AllocKB.description: Memory borrowed from 64KB page pool, in KB. This memory is given away to other parts of the server.

as2memPagePool1LookasideKB.name: as2memPagePool1LookasideKB
as2memPagePool1LookasideKB.description: Current memory in 8KB lookaside list, in KB. (Memory pages ready to be used.)

as2memPagePool64AllocKB.name: as2memPagePool64AllocKB
as2memPagePool64AllocKB.description: Memory borrowed from system, in KB. This memory is given away to other parts of the server.

as2memPagePool64LookasideKB.name: as2memPagePool64LookasideKB
as2memPagePool64LookasideKB.description: Current memory in 64KB lookaside list, in KB. (Memory pages ready to be used.)

as2memPagePool8AllocKB.name: as2memPagePool8AllocKB
as2memPagePool8AllocKB.description: Memory borrowed from 64KB page pool, in KB. This memory is given away to other parts of the server.

as2memPagePool8LookasideKB.name: as2memPagePool8LookasideKB
as2memPagePool8LookasideKB.description: Current memory in 8KB lookaside list, in KB. (Memory pages ready to be used.)

as2memPotenMemAggregatMapFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemAggregatMapFileKB
as2memPotenMemAggregatMapFileKB.description: Potential in-memory aggregation map file KB.

as2memPotenMemDimenIndHashFilKB.name: as2memPotenMemDimenIndHashFilKB
as2memPotenMemDimenIndHashFilKB.description: Potential in-memory dimension index (hash) file KB.

as2memPotenMemDimenProFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemDimenProFileKB
as2memPotenMemDimenProFileKB.description: Potential in-memory dimension proty file KB.

as2memPotenMemDimenStringFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemDimenStringFileKB
as2memPotenMemDimenStringFileKB.description: Potential in-memory dimension string file KB.

as2memPotenMemFactAggregFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemFactAggregFileKB
as2memPotenMemFactAggregFileKB.description: Potential in-memory fact aggregation file KB.

as2memPotenMemFactDataFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemFactDataFileKB
as2memPotenMemFactDataFileKB.description: Potential in-memory fact data file KB.

as2memPotenMemFactStringFileKB.name: as2memPotenMemFactStringFileKB
as2memPotenMemFactStringFileKB.description: Potential in-memory fact string file KB.

as2memQuotaBlocked.name: as2memQuotaBlocked
as2memQuotaBlocked.description: Current number of quota requests that are blocked until other memory quotas are freed.

as2memQuotaKB.name: as2memQuotaKB
as2memQuotaKB.description: Current memory quota, in KB. Memory quota is also known as a memory grant or memory reservation.

as2ProactiveCachingTable.name: as2ProactiveCachingTable
as2ProactiveCachingTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services Proactive Caching.

as2ProactiveCachingEntry.name: as2ProactiveCachingEntry
as2ProactiveCachingEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2pcNotificationsPerSec.name: as2pcNotificationsPerSec
as2pcNotificationsPerSec.description: Rate of notifications from relational database.

as2pcProcessCancellationsSec.name: as2pcProcessCancellationsSec
as2pcProcessCancellationsSec.description: Rate of processing cancellations caused by notifications.

as2ProcAggregationsTable.name: as2ProcAggregationsTable
as2ProcAggregationsTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services processing of aggregations in MOLAP data files.

as2ProcAggregationsEntry.name: as2ProcAggregationsEntry
as2ProcAggregationsEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2paCurrentPartitions.name: as2paCurrentPartitions
as2paCurrentPartitions.description: Current number of partitions being processed.

as2paMemorySizeBytes.name: as2paMemorySizeBytes
as2paMemorySizeBytes.description: Size of current aggregations in memory. This count is an estimate.

as2paMemorySizeRows.name: as2paMemorySizeRows
as2paMemorySizeRows.description: Size of current aggregations in memory. This count is an estimate.

as2paRowsMergedPerSec.name: as2paRowsMergedPerSec
as2paRowsMergedPerSec.description: Rate of rows merged or inserted into an aggregation.

as2paTempFileBytesWrittenPerSec.name: as2paTempFileBytesWrittenPerSec
as2paTempFileBytesWrittenPerSec.description: Rate of writing bytes to a temporary file. Temporary files are written when aggregations exceed memory limits.

as2paTempFileRowsWrittenPerSec.name: as2paTempFileRowsWrittenPerSec
as2paTempFileRowsWrittenPerSec.description: Rate of writing rows to a temporary file. Temporary files are written when aggregations exceed memory limits.

as2paTotalPartitions.name: as2paTotalPartitions
as2paTotalPartitions.description: Total number of partitions processed (successfully or otherwise).

as2ProcIndexesTable.name: as2ProcIndexesTable
as2ProcIndexesTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services processing of indexes for MOLAP data files.

as2ProcIndexesEntry.name: as2ProcIndexesEntry
as2ProcIndexesEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2ProcIndexesCurrentPartitions.name: as2ProcIndexesCurrentPartitions
as2ProcIndexesCurrentPartitions.description: Current number of partitions being processed.

as2ProcIndexesRowsPerSec.name: as2ProcIndexesRowsPerSec
as2ProcIndexesRowsPerSec.description: Rate of rows from MOLAP files used to create indexes.

as2ProcIndexesTotalPartitions.name: as2ProcIndexesTotalPartitions
as2ProcIndexesTotalPartitions.description: Total number of partitions processed (successfully or otherwise).

as2ProcIndexesTotalRows.name: as2ProcIndexesTotalRows
as2ProcIndexesTotalRows.description: Total rows from MOLAP files used to create indexes.

as2ProcessingTable.name: as2ProcessingTable
as2ProcessingTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services processing of data.

as2ProcessingEntry.name: as2ProcessingEntry
as2ProcessingEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2ProcessingRowsConvertedPerSec.name: as2ProcessingRowsConvertedPerSec
as2ProcessingRowsConvertedPerSec.description: Rate of rows converted during processing.

as2ProcessingRowsReadPerSec.name: as2ProcessingRowsReadPerSec
as2ProcessingRowsReadPerSec.description: Rate of rows read from all relational databases.

as2ProcessingRowsWrittenPerSec.name: as2ProcessingRowsWrittenPerSec
as2ProcessingRowsWrittenPerSec.description: Rate of rows written during processing.

as2ProcessingTotalRowsConverted.name: as2ProcessingTotalRowsConverted
as2ProcessingTotalRowsConverted.description: Count of rows converted during processing.

as2ProcessingTotalRowsRead.name: as2ProcessingTotalRowsRead
as2ProcessingTotalRowsRead.description: Count of rows read from all relational databases.

as2ProcessingTotalRowsWritten.name: as2ProcessingTotalRowsWritten
as2ProcessingTotalRowsWritten.description: Count of rows written during processing.

as2StorageEngineQueryTable.name: as2StorageEngineQueryTable
as2StorageEngineQueryTable.description: Statistics related to Microsoft Analysis Services storage engine queries.

as2StorageEngineQueryEntry.name: as2StorageEngineQueryEntry
as2StorageEngineQueryEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

as2seqAvgTimePerQuery.name: as2seqAvgTimePerQuery
as2seqAvgTimePerQuery.description: Average time per query, in milliseconds. Response time based on queries answered since the last counter measurement.

as2seqBytesSentPerSec.name: as2seqBytesSentPerSec
as2seqBytesSentPerSec.description: Rate of bytes sent by server to clients, in response to queries.

as2seqCalculationCacheHitsPerSec.name: as2seqCalculationCacheHitsPerSec
as2seqCalculationCacheHitsPerSec.description: Rate of calculation cache hits. This includes global, session, and query scope calculation caches.

as2seqCalculationCacheLookupsSec.name: as2seqCalculationCacheLookupsSec
as2seqCalculationCacheLookupsSec.description: Rate of calculation cache lookups. This includes global, session, and query scope calculation caches.

as2seqCurrentDimensionQueries.name: as2seqCurrentDimensionQueries
as2seqCurrentDimensionQueries.description: Current number of dimension queries being actively worked on.

as2seqCurrentMeasureGroupQueries.name: as2seqCurrentMeasureGroupQueries
as2seqCurrentMeasureGroupQueries.description: Current number of measure group queries being actively worked on.

as2seqDataBytesPerSec.name: as2seqDataBytesPerSec
as2seqDataBytesPerSec.description: Bytes read from the Data file.

as2seqDataReadsPerSec.name: as2seqDataReadsPerSec
as2seqDataReadsPerSec.description: Number of logical read operations using the Data file.

as2seqFlatCacheHitsPerSec.name: as2seqFlatCacheHitsPerSec
as2seqFlatCacheHitsPerSec.description: Rate of flat cache hits. This includes global, session, and query scope flat caches.

as2seqFlatCacheLookupsPerSec.name: as2seqFlatCacheLookupsPerSec
as2seqFlatCacheLookupsPerSec.description: Rate of flat cache lookups. This includes global, session, and query scope flat caches.

as2seqMapBytesPerSec.name: as2seqMapBytesPerSec
as2seqMapBytesPerSec.description: Bytes read from the Map file.

as2seqMapReadsPerSec.name: as2seqMapReadsPerSec
as2seqMapReadsPerSec.description: Number of logical read operations using the Map file.

as2seqMeasureGroupCacheHitsSec.name: as2seqMeasureGroupCacheHitsSec
as2seqMeasureGroupCacheHitsSec.description: Rate of measure group cache hits.

as2seqMeasureGroupCacheLookupSec.name: as2seqMeasureGroupCacheLookupSec
as2seqMeasureGroupCacheLookupSec.description: Rate of measure group cache lookups.

as2seqNetworkRoundTripsPerSec.name: as2seqNetworkRoundTripsPerSec
as2seqNetworkRoundTripsPerSec.description: Rate of network round trips. This includes all client/server communication.

as2seqPersistedCacheHitsPerSec.name: as2seqPersistedCacheHitsPerSec
as2seqPersistedCacheHitsPerSec.description: Rate of persisted cache hits. Persisted caches are created by the MDX script CACHE statement.

as2seqsistedCacheLookupsSec.name: as2seqsistedCacheLookupsSec
as2seqsistedCacheLookupsSec.description: Rate of sisted cache lookups. sisted caches are created by the MDX script CACHE statement.

as2seqQueryFromCacheDirectSec.name: as2seqQueryFromCacheDirectSec
as2seqQueryFromCacheDirectSec.description: Rate of queries answered from cache directly.

as2seqQueryFromCacheFilteredSec.name: as2seqQueryFromCacheFilteredSec
as2seqQueryFromCacheFilteredSec.description: Rate of queries answered by filtering existing cache entry.

as2seqQueriesFromFilePerSec.name: as2seqQueriesFromFilePerSec
as2seqQueriesFromFilePerSec.description: Rate of queries answered from files.

as2seqRowsSentPerSec.name: as2seqRowsSentPerSec
as2seqRowsSentPerSec.description: Rate of rows sent by server to clients.

as2seqTotalBytesSent.name: as2seqTotalBytesSent
as2seqTotalBytesSent.description: Total bytes sent by server to clients, in response to queries.

as2seqTotalMeasureGroupQueries.name: as2seqTotalMeasureGroupQueries
as2seqTotalMeasureGroupQueries.description: Total number of queries to measure group.

as2seqTotalNetworkRoundTrips.name: as2seqTotalNetworkRoundTrips
as2seqTotalNetworkRoundTrips.description: Total network round trips. This includes all client/server communication.

as2seqTotalQueryFromCacheDirect.name: as2seqTotalQueryFromCacheDirect
as2seqTotalQueryFromCacheDirect.description: Total number of queries derived directly from cache. Note that this is partition.

as2seqTotalQueryFromCachFiltered.name: as2seqTotalQueryFromCachFiltered
as2seqTotalQueryFromCachFiltered.description: Total queries answered by filtering existing cache entries.

as2seqTotalQueriesFromFile.name: as2seqTotalQueriesFromFile
as2seqTotalQueriesFromFile.description: Total number of queries answered from files.

as2seqTotalRowsSent.name: as2seqTotalRowsSent
as2seqTotalRowsSent.description: Total rows sent by server to clients.

as2ThreadsEntry.name: as2ThreadsEntry

as2ThdsLongParsingBusyThreads.description: Number of busy threads in the long parsing thread pool.

as2ThdsLongParsingIdleThreads.name: as2ThdsLongParsingIdleThreads
as2ThdsLongParsingIdleThreads.description: Number of idle threads in the long parsing thread pool.

as2ThdsProcessingPoolBusyThreads.description: Number of busy threads in the processing thread pool.

as2ThdsProcessingPoolIdleThreads.name: as2ThdsProcessingPoolIdleThreads
as2ThdsProcessingPoolIdleThreads.description: Number of idle threads in the processing thread pool.

as2ThdsProcessPoolJobQueueLength.name: as2ThdsProcessPoolJobQueueLength
as2ThdsProcessPoolJobQueueLength.description: Number of jobs in the queue of the processing thread pool.

as2ThdsProcessingPoolJobRate.name: as2ThdsProcessingPoolJobRate
as2ThdsProcessingPoolJobRate.description: Rate of jobs through the processing thread pool.

as2ThdsQueryPoolBusyThreads.name: as2ThdsQueryPoolBusyThreads
as2ThdsQueryPoolBusyThreads.description: Number of busy threads in the query thread pool.

as2ThdsQueryPoolIdleThreads.name: as2ThdsQueryPoolIdleThreads
as2ThdsQueryPoolIdleThreads.description: Number of idle threads in the query thread pool.

as2ThdsQueryPoolJobQueueLength.name: as2ThdsQueryPoolJobQueueLength
as2ThdsQueryPoolJobQueueLength.description: Number of jobs in the queue of the query thread pool.

as2ThdsQueryPoolJobRate.description: Rate of jobs through the query thread pool.

as2ThdsShortParsingBusyThreads.name: as2ThdsShortParsingBusyThreads
as2ThdsShortParsingBusyThreads.description: Number of busy threads in the short parsing thread pool.

as2ThdsShortParsingIdleThreads.name: as2ThdsShortParsingIdleThreads
as2ThdsShortParsingIdleThreads.description: Number of idle threads in the short parsing thread pool.

as2ThdsShortParsingJobQueueLeng.name: as2ThdsShortParsingJobQueueLeng
as2ThdsShortParsingJobQueueLeng.description: Number of jobs in the queue of the short parsing thread pool.

as2ThdsShortParsingJobRate.name: as2ThdsShortParsingJobRate
as2ThdsShortParsingJobRate.description: Rate of jobs through the short parsing thread pool.

ss2NameTable.name: ss2NameTable
ss2NameTable.description: This table contains the list of SQL Server instance names installed. The ss2NameIndex is used to refer to all other SQL Server SNMP entries.

ss2NameEntry.name: ss2NameEntry
ss2NameEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server name instance.

ss2NameIndex.name: ss2NameIndex
ss2NameIndex.description: The index number associated with the instance name

ss2NameInstance.name: ss2NameInstance
ss2NameInstance.description: The name of the SQL Server installed instance.

ss2AccessMethodsTable.name: ss2AccessMethodsTable
ss2AccessMethodsTable.description: The Access Methods object in SQL Server provides counters to monitor how the logical data within the database is accessed. Physical access to the database pages on disk is monitored using the Buffer Manager counters. Monitoring the methods used to access data stored in the database can help you to determine whether query performance can be improved by adding or modifying indexes, adding or moving partitions, adding files or file groups, defragmenting indexes, or by rewriting queries. The Access Methods counters can also be used to monitor the amount of data, indexes, and free space within the database, thereby indicating data volume and fragmentation for each server instance. Excessive index fragmentation can impair performance.

ss2AccessMethodsEntry.name: ss2AccessMethodsEntry
ss2AccessMethodsEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server AccessMethods instance.

ss2amAUCleanupBatchesPerSec.name: ss2amAUCleanupBatchesPerSec
ss2amAUCleanupBatchesPerSec.description: The number of batches that completed successfully per second by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped allocation units.

ss2amAUCleanupsPerSec.name: ss2amAUCleanupsPerSec
ss2amAUCleanupsPerSec.description: The number of allocation units per second that were successfully dropped by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped allocation units. Each allocation unit drop requires multiple batches.

ss2amByReferenceLobCreateCount.name: ss2amByReferenceLobCreateCount
ss2amByReferenceLobCreateCount.description: Count of large object (LOB) values that were passed by reference. By-reference lobs are used in certain bulk operations to avoid the cost of passing them by value.

ss2amByReferenceLobUseCount.name: ss2amByReferenceLobUseCount
ss2amByReferenceLobUseCount.description: Count of by-reference lob values that were used. By-reference lobs are used in certain bulk operations to avoid the cost of passing them by value.

ss2amCountLobReadahead.name: ss2amCountLobReadahead
ss2amCountLobReadahead.description: Count of lob pages on which readahead was issued.

ss2amCountPullInRow.name: ss2amCountPullInRow
ss2amCountPullInRow.description: Count of values that were pulled in-row from off-row.

ss2amCountPushOffRow.name: ss2amCountPushOffRow
ss2amCountPushOffRow.description: Count of values that were pushed from in-row to off-row.

ss2amDeferredDroppedRowsets.name: ss2amDeferredDroppedRowsets
ss2amDeferredDroppedRowsets.description: The number of rowsets created as a result of aborted online index build operations that are waiting to be dropped by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped rowsets.

ss2amDeferredDroppedAUs.name: ss2amDeferredDroppedAUs
ss2amDeferredDroppedAUs.description: The number of allocation units waiting to be dropped by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped allocation units.

ss2amDroppedRowsetCleanupsPerSec.name: ss2amDroppedRowsetCleanupsPerSec
ss2amDroppedRowsetCleanupsPerSec.description: The number of rowsets per second created as a result of aborted online index build operations that were successfully dropped by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped rowsets.

ss2amDroppedRowsetsSkippedPerSec.name: ss2amDroppedRowsetsSkippedPerSec
ss2amDroppedRowsetsSkippedPerSec.description: The number of rowsets per second created as a result of aborted online index build operations that were skipped by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped rowsets created.

ss2amExtentDeallocationsPerSec.name: ss2amExtentDeallocationsPerSec
ss2amExtentDeallocationsPerSec.description: Number of extents deallocated per second in all databases in this SQL Server instance.

ss2amExtentsAllocatedPerSec.name: ss2amExtentsAllocatedPerSec
ss2amExtentsAllocatedPerSec.description: Number of extents allocated per second in all databases in this SQL Server instance.

ss2amFailedAUCleanupBatchesSec.name: ss2amFailedAUCleanupBatchesSec
ss2amFailedAUCleanupBatchesSec.description: The number of batches second that failed and required retry, by the background task that cleans up deferred dropped allocation units. Failure could be due to lack of memory or disk space, hardware failure and other reasons.

ss2amFailedLeafPageCookie.name: ss2amFailedLeafPageCookie
ss2amFailedLeafPageCookie.description: The number of times that a leaf page cookie could not be used during an index search since changes happened on the leaf page. The cookie is used to speed up index search.

ss2amFailedTreePageCookie.name: ss2amFailedTreePageCookie
ss2amFailedTreePageCookie.description: The number of times that a tree page cookie could not be used during an index search since changes happened on the parent pages of those tree pages. The cookie is used to speed up index search.

ss2amForwardedRecordsPerSec.name: ss2amForwardedRecordsPerSec
ss2amForwardedRecordsPerSec.description: Number of records fetched through forwarded record pointers.

ss2amFreeSpacePageFetchesPerSec.name: ss2amFreeSpacePageFetchesPerSec
ss2amFreeSpacePageFetchesPerSec.description: Number of pages fetched per second by free space scans. These scans search for free space within pages already allocated to an allocation unit, to satisfy requests to insert or modify record fragments.

ss2amFreeSpaceScansPerSec.name: ss2amFreeSpaceScansPerSec
ss2amFreeSpaceScansPerSec.description: Number of scans per second that were initiated to search for free space within pages already allocated to an allocation unit to insert or modify record fragments. Each scan may find multiple pages.

ss2amFullScansPerSec.name: ss2amFullScansPerSec
ss2amFullScansPerSec.description: Number of unrestricted full scans. These can either be base table or full index scans.

ss2amIndexSearchesPerSec.name: ss2amIndexSearchesPerSec
ss2amIndexSearchesPerSec.description: Number of index searches. Index searches are used to start range scans, single index record fetches, and to reposition within an index.

ss2amLobSSProviderCreateCount.name: ss2amLobSSProviderCreateCount
ss2amLobSSProviderCreateCount.description: Count of LOB Storage Service Providers created. One worktable created per LOB Storage Service Provider.

ss2amLobSSProviderDestroyCount.name: ss2amLobSSProviderDestroyCount
ss2amLobSSProviderDestroyCount.description: Count of LOB Storage Service Providers destroyed.

ss2amLobSSProvideTruncationCount.name: ss2amLobSSProvideTruncationCount
ss2amLobSSProvideTruncationCount.description: Count of LOB Storage Service Providers truncated.

ss2amMixedPageAllocationsPerSec.name: ss2amMixedPageAllocationsPerSec
ss2amMixedPageAllocationsPerSec.description: Number of pages allocated per second from mixed extents. These could be used for storing the IAM pages and the first eight pages that are allocated to an allocation unit.

ss2amPageDeallocationsPerSec.name: ss2amPageDeallocationsPerSec
ss2amPageDeallocationsPerSec.description: Number of pages deallocated per second in all databases in this SQL Server instance. These include pages from mixed extents and uniform extents.

ss2amPageSplitsPerSec.name: ss2amPageSplitsPerSec
ss2amPageSplitsPerSec.description: Number of page splits per second that occur as a result of overflowing index pages.

ss2amPageCompressionAttemptsSec.name: ss2amPageCompressionAttemptsSec
ss2amPageCompressionAttemptsSec.description: Number of attempts to compress a database page second

ss2amPagesAllocatedPerSec.name: ss2amPagesAllocatedPerSec
ss2amPagesAllocatedPerSec.description: Number of pages allocated per second in all databases in this SQL Server instance. These include pages allocations from both mixed extents and uniform extents.

ss2amPagesCompressedPerSec.name: ss2amPagesCompressedPerSec
ss2amPagesCompressedPerSec.description: Number of times a database page was compressed

ss2amProbeScansPerSec.name: ss2amProbeScansPerSec
ss2amProbeScansPerSec.description: Number of probe scans per second that are used to find at most one single qualified row in an index or base table directly.

ss2amRangeScansPerSec.name: ss2amRangeScansPerSec
ss2amRangeScansPerSec.description: Number of qualified range scans through indexes per second.

ss2amScanPointRevalidationsSec.name: ss2amScanPointRevalidationsSec
ss2amScanPointRevalidationsSec.description: Number of times the scan point had to be revalidated to continue the scan.

ss2amSkippedGhostedRecordsPerSec.name: ss2amSkippedGhostedRecordsPerSec
ss2amSkippedGhostedRecordsPerSec.description: Number of ghosted records per second skipped during scans.

ss2amTableLockEscalationsPerSec.name: ss2amTableLockEscalationsPerSec
ss2amTableLockEscalationsPerSec.description: The number of times locks on a table were escalated.

ss2amUsedLeafPageCookie.name: ss2amUsedLeafPageCookie
ss2amUsedLeafPageCookie.description: Number of times a leaf page cookie was used successfully during an index search since no change happened on the leaf page. The cookie is used to speed up index search.

ss2amUsedTreePageCookie.name: ss2amUsedTreePageCookie
ss2amUsedTreePageCookie.description: Number of times a tree page cookie was used successfully during an index search since no change happened on the parent page of the tree page. The cookie is used to speed up index search.

ss2amWorkfilesCreatedPerSec.name: ss2amWorkfilesCreatedPerSec
ss2amWorkfilesCreatedPerSec.description: Number of work files created per second. For example, work files could be used to store temporary results for hash joins and hash aggregates.

ss2amWorktablesCreatedPerSec.name: ss2amWorktablesCreatedPerSec
ss2amWorktablesCreatedPerSec.description: Number of work tables created per second. For example, work tables could be used to store temporary results for query spool, LOB variables, XML variables, and cursors.

ss2amWorktablesFromCacheRatio.name: ss2amWorktablesFromCacheRatio
ss2amWorktablesFromCacheRatio.description: Percentage of work tables created where the initial two pages of the work table were not allocated but were immediately available from the work table cache.

ss2BackupDeviceTable.name: ss2BackupDeviceTable
ss2BackupDeviceTable.description: The Backup Device object provides counters to monitor Microsoft SQL Server backup devices used for backup and restore operations. Monitor backup devices when you want to determine the throughput or the progress and performance of your backup and restore operations on a per device basis. To monitor the throughput of the entire database backup or restore operation, use the Backup/Restore Throughput/sec counter of the SQL Server Databases object.

ss2BackupDeviceEntry.name: ss2BackupDeviceEntry
ss2BackupDeviceEntry.description: Performance information for one particular instance of 'Backup Device' object.

ss2BackupDeviceDeviceputBytesSec.name: ss2BackupDeviceDeviceputBytesSec
ss2BackupDeviceDeviceputBytesSec.description: Read/write throughput for a backup device.

ss2BrokerActivationTable.name: ss2BrokerActivationTable
ss2BrokerActivationTable.description: The BrokerActivation performance object contains performance counters that report information on stored procedure activation.

ss2BrokerActivationEntry.name: ss2BrokerActivationEntry
ss2BrokerActivationEntry.description: Performance information for one particular instance of 'Broker Activation' object.

ss2baStoredProceduresInvokedSec.name: ss2baStoredProceduresInvokedSec
ss2baStoredProceduresInvokedSec.description: The number of stored procedures that are being invoked second.

ss2baTaskLimitReached.name: ss2baTaskLimitReached
ss2baTaskLimitReached.description: The total number of times the activated task limit on a queue has been reached.

ss2baTaskLimitReachedPerSec.name: ss2baTaskLimitReachedPerSec
ss2baTaskLimitReachedPerSec.description: The number of times the activated task limit on a queue has been reached per second.

ss2baTasksAbortedPerSec.name: ss2baTasksAbortedPerSec
ss2baTasksAbortedPerSec.description: The number of activated tasks that are being aborted per second.

ss2baTasksRunning.name: ss2baTasksRunning
ss2baTasksRunning.description: The total number of activated tasks that are currently running.

ss2baTasksStartedPerSec.name: ss2baTasksStartedPerSec
ss2baTasksStartedPerSec.description: The number of activated tasks that are being started per second.

ss2BrokerStatisticsTable.name: ss2BrokerStatisticsTable
ss2BrokerStatisticsTable.description: The Broker Statistics performance object contains performance counters that report general Service Broker information for an instance of the Database Engine.

ss2BrokerStatisticsEntry.name: ss2BrokerStatisticsEntry
ss2BrokerStatisticsEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server BrokerStatistics instance.

ss2bsActivationErrorsTotal.name: ss2bsActivationErrorsTotal
ss2bsActivationErrorsTotal.description: The number of times an activation stored procedure exited with an error.

ss2bsBrokerTransactionRollbacks.name: ss2bsBrokerTransactionRollbacks
ss2bsBrokerTransactionRollbacks.description: The number of Service Broker related transactions that have rolled back.

ss2bsCorruptedMessagesTotal.name: ss2bsCorruptedMessagesTotal
ss2bsCorruptedMessagesTotal.description: The number of corrupted messages that were received in the instance.

ss2bsDequeuedTransmissionQMsgSec.name: ss2bsDequeuedTransmissionQMsgSec
ss2bsDequeuedTransmissionQMsgSec.description: The number of messages that have been removed from the broker transmission queue second.

ss2bsDialogTimerEventCount.name: ss2bsDialogTimerEventCount
ss2bsDialogTimerEventCount.description: The number of dialog endpoint related timer events in the Broker.

ss2bsDroppedMessagesTotal.name: ss2bsDroppedMessagesTotal
ss2bsDroppedMessagesTotal.description: The number of messages that were received in the instance but could not be delivered.

ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesTotal.name: ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesTotal
ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesTotal.description: Total number of messages from local endpoints that are successfully delivered directly into local target queues.

ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedLocalMessagesPerSec.description: The number of messages from local endpoints that are successfully delivered directly into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesTotal.name: ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesTotal
ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesTotal.description: Total number of messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues.

ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedMessagesPerSec.description: The number of messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP1MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP1MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP1MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 1 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP10MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP10MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP10MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 10 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP2MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP2MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP2MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 2 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP3MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP3MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP3MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 3 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP4MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP4MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP4MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 4 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP5MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP5MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP5MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 5 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP6MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP6MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP6MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 6 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP7MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP7MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP7MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 7 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP8MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP8MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP8MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 8 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedP9MessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedP9MessagesPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedP9MessagesPerSec.description: The number of priority 9 messages from local endpoints and the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second.

ss2bsEnqueuedTransmissionQMsgSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedTransmissionQMsgSec
ss2bsEnqueuedTransmissionQMsgSec.description: The number of messages that have been placed into the broker transmission queue second.

ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragTot.name: ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragTot
ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragTot.description: Total number of message fragments from the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues. Note that the message can be marked as disabled if it is incomplete and/or out of order.

ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragSec
ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgFragSec.description: The number of message fragments from the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues second. Note that the message can be marked as disabled if it is incomplete and/or out of order.

ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsTotal.name: ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsTotal
ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsTotal.description: Total number of messages from the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues. This includes all messages from remote endpoints and messages from local endpoints which go through the transport.

ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsPerSec.name: ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsPerSec
ss2bsEnqueuedTransportMsgsPerSec.description: The number of messages from the transport that are successfully delivered into local target queues per second. This includes all messages from remote endpoints and messages from local endpoints which go through the transport.

ss2bsForwardedMessagesTotal.name: ss2bsForwardedMessagesTotal
ss2bsForwardedMessagesTotal.description: Total number of forwarded messages successfully sent.

ss2bsForwardedMessagesPerSec.name: ss2bsForwardedMessagesPerSec
ss2bsForwardedMessagesPerSec.description: The number of forwarded messages successfully sent per second.

ss2bsForwardedMsgByteTotal.name: ss2bsForwardedMsgByteTotal
ss2bsForwardedMsgByteTotal.description: Total number of forwarded message bytes successfully sent.

ss2bsForwardedMsgBytesPerSec.name: ss2bsForwardedMsgBytesPerSec
ss2bsForwardedMsgBytesPerSec.description: The number of forwarded message bytes successfully sent per second.

ss2bsForwardedMsgDiscardedTotal.name: ss2bsForwardedMsgDiscardedTotal
ss2bsForwardedMsgDiscardedTotal.description: Total number of forwarded messages discarded due to forwarded message memory limits, age limits, etc.

ss2bsForwardedMsgsDiscardedSec.name: ss2bsForwardedMsgsDiscardedSec
ss2bsForwardedMsgsDiscardedSec.description: The number of forwarded messages that were discarded second due to forwarded message memory limits, age limits, etc.

ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgBytes.name: ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgBytes
ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgBytes.description: The number of forwarded message bytes that have not been successfully sent yet.

ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgCount.name: ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgCount
ss2bsForwardedPendingMsgCount.description: The number of forwarded messages that have not been successfully sent yet.

ss2bsSQLReceiveTotal.name: ss2bsSQLReceiveTotal
ss2bsSQLReceiveTotal.description: Total number of SQL RECEIVE commands processed by the Broker.

ss2bsSQLReceivesPerSec.name: ss2bsSQLReceivesPerSec
ss2bsSQLReceivesPerSec.description: The number of SQL RECEIVE commands processed by the Broker per second.

ss2bsSQLSendTotal.name: ss2bsSQLSendTotal
ss2bsSQLSendTotal.description: Total number of SQL SEND commands processed by the Broker.

ss2bsSQLSendsPerSec.name: ss2bsSQLSendsPerSec
ss2bsSQLSendsPerSec.description: The number of SQL SEND commands processed by the Broker per second.

ss2BrokerTOStatisticsTable.name: ss2BrokerTOStatisticsTable
ss2BrokerTOStatisticsTable.description: The Broker TO Statistics performance object reports information about how many times Service Broker dialogs request transmission objects, and how often transmission objects are written to tempdb. Transmission objects record the state of message transmissions for a Service Broker dialog. They are stored in memory. To free memory, Service Broker periodically writes batches of inactive transmission objects to work tables in tempdb.

ss2BrokerTOStatisticsEntry.name: ss2BrokerTOStatisticsEntry
ss2BrokerTOStatisticsEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server BrokerTOStatistics instance.

ss2btosAvgLengthOfBatchedWrites.name: ss2btosAvgLengthOfBatchedWrites
ss2btosAvgLengthOfBatchedWrites.description: Average Number of Transmission Objects saved in a batch.

ss2btosAvgTimeBetweenBatchesMs.name: ss2btosAvgTimeBetweenBatchesMs
ss2btosAvgTimeBetweenBatchesMs.description: Average time between Transmission Object batch flushes.

ss2btosAvgTimeToWriteBatchMs.name: ss2btosAvgTimeToWriteBatchMs
ss2btosAvgTimeToWriteBatchMs.description: Average time to save a Transmission Object batch.

ss2btosTransmissionObjGetsPerSec.name: ss2btosTransmissionObjGetsPerSec
ss2btosTransmissionObjGetsPerSec.description: The number of Transmission Objects requested per second.

ss2btosTransmissionObjSetDirtSec.name: ss2btosTransmissionObjSetDirtSec
ss2btosTransmissionObjSetDirtSec.description: The number of Transmission Objects marked dirty second.

ss2btosTransmissionObjWritesSec.name: ss2btosTransmissionObjWritesSec
ss2btosTransmissionObjWritesSec.description: The number of Transmission Objects saved second.

ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportTable.name: ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportTable
ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportTable.description: The Broker / DBM Transport performance object contains performance counters that report networking information for Service Broker and database mirroring.

ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportEntry.name: ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportEntry
ss2BrokerPerDBMTransportEntry.description: Performance information for one SQL Server BrokerPerDBMTransport instance.

ss2bdtCurrentBytesForRecvIPerO.name: ss2bdtCurrentBytesForRecvIPerO
ss2bdtCurrentBytesForRecvIPerO.description: The number of bytes associated with current transport receive I/O operations that haven't completed.

ss2bdtCurrentBytesForSendIPerO.name: ss2bdtCurrentBytesForSendIPerO
ss2bdtCurrentBytesForSendIPerO.description: The number of buffer bytes associated with current transport send I/O operations that haven't completed.

ss2bdtCurrentMsgFragForSendIO.name: ss2bdtCurrentMsgFragForSendIO
ss2bdtCurrentMsgFragForSendIO.description: The current number of message fragments associated with current transport send I/O oations that haven't completed.

ss2bdtMessageFragmentP1SenSec.name: ss2bdtMessageFragmentP1SenSec
ss2bdtMessageFragmentP1SenSec.description: The number of priority 1 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP10SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP10SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP10SendsSec.description: The number of priority 10 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP2SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP2SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP2SendsSec.description: The number of priority 2 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP3SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP3SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP3SendsSec.description: The number of priority 3 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP4SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP4SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP4SendsSec.description: The number of priority 4 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP5SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP5SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP5SendsSec.description: The number of priority 5 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP6SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP6SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP6SendsSec.description: The number of priority 6 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP7SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP7SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP7SendsSec.description: The number of priority 7 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP8SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP8SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP8SendsSec.description: The number of priority 8 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentP9SendsSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentP9SendsSec
ss2bdtMsgFragmentP9SendsSec.description: The number of priority 9 message fragments sent second in transport send I/O oations.

ss2bdtMsgFragmentReceivesSec.name: ss2bdtMsgFragmentReceivesSec

ss2BufferManagerTable.name: ss2BufferManagerTable
ss2BufferManagerTable.description: The Buffer Manager object provides counters to monitor how SQL Server uses: * Memory to store data pages, internal data structures, and the procedure cache. * Counters to monitor the physical I/O as SQL Server reads and writes database pages. Monitoring the memory and the counters used by SQL Server helps you determine: * If bottlenecks exist from inadequate physical memory. If it cannot store frequently accessed data in cache, SQL Server must retrieve the data from disk. * If query performance can be improved by adding more memory, or by making more memory available to the data cache or SQL Server internal structures. * How often SQL Server needs to read data from disk. Compared with other operations, such as memory access, physical I/O consumes a lot of time. Minimizing physical I/O can improve query performance. You can also monitor Address Windowing Extensions (AWE) activity in SQL Server with the AWE counters. For example, you can make sure that SQL Server has enough memory allocated for AWE to run properly.

ss2DatabasesTable.name: ss2DatabasesTable
ss2DatabasesTable.description: The Databases object in SQL Server provides counters to monitor bulk copy operations, backup and restore throughput, and transaction log activities. Monitor transactions and the transaction log to determine how much user activity is occurring in the database and how full the transaction log is becoming. The amount of user activity can determine the performance of the database and affect log size, locking, and replication. Monitoring low-level log activity to gauge user activity and resource usage can help you to identify performance bottlenecks. Multiple instances of the Databases object, each representing a single database, can be monitored at the same time.

ss2LocksTable.name: ss2LocksTable
ss2LocksTable.description: The Locks object in Microsoft SQL Server provides information about SQL Server locks on individual resource types. Locks are held on SQL Server resources, such as rows read or modified during a transaction, to prevent concurrent use of resources by different transactions. For example, if an exclusive (X) lock is held on a row within a table by a transaction, no other transaction can modify that row until the lock is released. Minimizing locks increases concurrency, which can improve performance. Multiple instances of the Locks object can be monitored at the same time, with each instance representing a lock on a resource type.

ss2LocksEntry.name: ss2LocksEntry
ss2LocksEntry.description: Performance information for one particular instance of 'Locks' object.

ss2MemoryManagerTable.name: ss2MemoryManagerTable
ss2MemoryManagerTable.description: The Memory Manager object in Microsoft SQL Server provides counters to monitor overall server memory usage. Monitoring overall server memory usage to gauge user activity and resource usage can help you to identify performance bottlenecks. Monitoring the memory used by an instance of SQL Server can help determine: * If bottlenecks exist from inadequate physical memory for storing frequently accessed data in cache. If memory is inadequate, SQL Server must retrieve the data from disk. * If query performance can be improved by adding more memory or by making more memory available to the data cache or SQL Server internal structures.

ss2SQLStatisticsTable.name: ss2SQLStatisticsTable
ss2SQLStatisticsTable.description: The SQL Statistics object in SQL Server provides counters to monitor compilation and the type of requests sent to an instance of SQL Server. Monitoring the number of query compilations and recompilations and the number of batches received by an instance of SQL Server gives you an indication of how quickly SQL Server is processing user queries and how effectively the query optimizer is processing the queries. Compilation is a significant part of a query's turnaround time. In order to save the compilation cost, the Database Engine saves the compiled query plan in a query cache. The objective of the cache is to reduce compilation by storing compiled queries for later reuse, therefore ending the requirement to recompile queries when later executed. However, each unique query must be compiled at least one time. Query recompilations can be caused by the following factors: * Schema changes, including base schema changes such as adding columns or indexes to a table, or statistics schema changes such as inserting or deleting a significant number of rows from a table. * Environment (SET statement) changes. Changes in session settings such as ANSI_PADDING or ANSI_NULLS can cause a query to be recompiled.

ss2sqsMisguidedPlanExecutionsSec.name: ss2sqsMisguidedPlanExecutionsSec
ss2sqsMisguidedPlanExecutionsSec.description: Number of plan executions second in which a plan guide could not be honored during plan generation. The plan guide was disregarded and normal compilation was used to generate the executed plan.

ss2TransactionsTable.name: ss2TransactionsTable
ss2TransactionsTable.description: The Transactions object in Microsoft SQL Server provides counters to monitor the number of transactions active in an instance of the Database Engine, and the effects of those transactions on resources such as the snapshot isolation row version store in tempdb. Transactions are logical units of work; a set of operations that must either all succeed or all be erased from a database in order to maintain the logical integrity of the data. All modifications of data in SQL Server databases are made in transactions. When a database is set to allow snapshot isolation level, SQL Server must maintain a record of the modifications made to each row in a database. Each time a row is modified, a copy of the row as it existed before the modification is recorded in a row version store in tempdb. Many of the counters in the Transaction object can be used to monitor the size and rate of growth of the row version store in tempdb. The Transactions object counters report all transactions in one instance of the Database Engine.

ss2UserSettableTable.name: ss2UserSettableTable
ss2UserSettableTable.description: The User Settable object in Microsoft SQL Server allows you to create custom counter instances. Use custom counter instances to monitor aspects of the server not monitored by existing counters, such as components unique to your SQL Server database (for example, the number of customer orders logged or the product inventory). The User Settable object contains 10 instances of the query counter: User counter 1 through User counter 10. These counters map to the SQL Server stored procedures sp_user_counter1 through sp_user_counter10. As these stored procedures are executed by user applications, the values set by the stored procedures are displayed in System Monitor. A counter can monitor any single integer value (for example, a stored procedure that counts how many orders for a particular product have occurred in one day).
